job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the coordination and implementation of products within various systems, which aligns with the integration aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions integration of AI solutions into processes, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and translation of guidelines into algorithms, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in the various systems.
job_tasks.justification: This implies deployment and integration into existing systems, touching on operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: This describes project coordination and product lifecycle management, which are software development related activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on project management and delivery aspects of software products.

job_tasks.phrase: (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the development and enhancement of products, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
job_tasks.justification: Testing is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the creation and upkeep of machine learning algorithms.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
job_tasks.justification: While customer-facing, preparing responses often involves understanding and explaining the implemented systems/products.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
job_tasks.justification: Issue detection, root cause analysis, and corrective actions are standard software maintenance and debugging tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding the domain and strategic developments in AI/ML.

job_tasks.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to understanding and adhering to business and ethical constraints.

soft_skills.justification: Coordination implies communication and collaboration with various stakeholders.

Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions

profile.rationale: The role primarily focuses on software development and integration tasks (Macro-Category A), such as coordinating exam development, implementing products, testing, and maintaining systems. While it mentions translating guidelines into machine learning algorithms and staying updated on AI/ML research, these are in service of integrating AI solutions into existing processes rather than developing core AI models or specializing in GenAI tasks like prompt engineering or RAG. The core of the job is product development and integration with an AI component, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a software engineering focus with the integration of AI. The tasks are well-defined, and the role's primary objective is product development and maintenance, with AI being a component to be integrated. The distinction between core AI development and AI integration is clear enough to assign a profile with high confidence, though it doesn't delve deeply into specific GenAI techniques.
